channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Walmart has a secret weapon: its growing appeal to higher-end shoppers
Dow industrials off 200 points at opening bell as skid continues — live coverage
These growth stocks are attractively valued as 2025 approaches
item.description: Stocks such as Oracle and Micron Technology are among several growth plays left in a market that recently soared to records.

item.title: CrowdStrike moves to dismiss Delta Air Lines suit, citing contract terms
item.description: CrowdStrike moved Monday evening to dismiss Delta Air Lines' lawsuit around the July cybersecurity outage that led to canceled flights.

item.title: This company is giving workers a full month of holiday PTO: ‘Everyone is going to be coming back with a clear mind’
item.description: The roughly 30 full- and part-time workers at Cakes Body, an online retailer, will be offline from Dec. 15 to Jan. 15 while receiving their normal pay...

item.title: Taco Bell is introducing an unexpected new menu item—going up against competition where ‘loyalty runs deep’
item.description: New offering will come with a slight Mexican twist.

item.title: Investment pros have gotten superbullish on stocks. Which may be a sell signal.
U.S. industrial output declines for a third straight month
The only FTC commissioner who didn’t vote to crack down on junk fees just so happens to be Trump’s pick to lead the FTC
item.description: Andrew Ferguson, Trump's choice to replace Lina Khan at the FTC, was not looking to force hotels or live-event promoters to disclose extra fees up fro...

item.title: The pros and cons of Medicare Advantage plans
item.description: Advice to help you choose between Original Medicare and Medicare Advantage plans.

item.title: Trump trade counselor Peter Navarro says planned tariffs won't spur inflation
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to enact across-the-board tariffs, targeted import duties on China, Canada and Mexico, and tax cuts.

item.title: Nvidia is in correction territory. Microsoft CEO remark may make matters worse.
How to play a potential biotech breakout in 2025 with options
item.description: Nishant Pant gives a bullish call spread trade on the iShares Biotechnology ETF.

item.title: A former Fed president says she would not cut interest rates this week, but she expects the central bank will anyway
item.description: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut its key interest rate by 25 basis points on Wednesday.

item.title: Rich families pay this admissions specialist up to $750,000 to get their kids into the Ivy League
item.description: They start preparing for college as early as 5th grade.
